attributes.action: Pass the decision on what Pay, Allowances and expenses MPs are entitled to the general public by means of referendi.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has become apparent that Mps are paid far too much for the functions they fulfill, and the allowances are so far removed from reality as to be ludicrous.  The rules currently in operation make a mockery of the efforts of every worker in the country and must be changed.  The people should be presented with a choice of four or five options, ranging from leaving things as they are, to paying MPs the minimum wage {Which they themselves deem fine for the bulk of the population).  The option chosen by the people should be strictly monitored by a person directly answerable to the Queen and having absolutely no duty to Parliament.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
